name: win5x-monorepo
description: Win5x - Web-based wheel spin game with admin and user modules

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm run dev:backend" "pnpm run dev:admin" "pnpm run dev:user"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter common build && pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter admin build && pnpm --filter user build
